body:
@Thomasdezeeuw not clear why you answered to this issue. the code you included basically does this: 
`
fmt.Println("New time 2006-01-02 15:04:05 +0000 UTC")
`

My pull request does something completely different. It activates the fake clock that is built into golang which is a sophisticated solution to a complicated concurrency problem (println does not help here). Some details about the fake clock are documented here:
https://blog.golang.org/playground
